mapper.select: SELECT a.faq_no, a.faq_title, b.user_id, b.user_name, a.faq_content, TO_CHAR(a.faq_date, 'MM.dd') AS faq_date FROM faqs a , users b WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.faq_del_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faqs( user_id, user_name, faq_no, faq_title, faq_content, faq_date, faq_del_yn, faq_sic_yn ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM faqs), #{faqTitle}, #{faqContent}, SYSDATE, 'N', 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT a.faq_no, a.faq_title, b.user_id, b.user_name, a.faq_content, TO_CHAR(a.faq_date, 'yyyy.MM.dd hh24:mm') AS faq_date FROM faqs a, users b WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.faq_no = #{faqNo} AND a.faq_del_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE faqs SET faq_title = #{faqTitle}, faq_content = #{faqContent} WHERE 1=1 AND faq_no = #{faqNo}
